title: Official Junk
post:
They could remain factual, present the radiocarbon dating, and quote Pr Ramsey, the director of the Oxford Radiocarbon Laboratory, who claimed :
everyone […] need to have a critical look on the evidence [including the radiocarbon dating] that they have come up with in order for us to try to work out somekind of a coherent story that fits and tells us the truth of the history of this intriguing cloth
Let’s hope the next wave of articles surrounding the Shroud’s technological exposition will have this much needed critical look.
author: anoxie
